summary: Just for me to test BB coding and see how things look like
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nodiatis.com/personality.htm][img]http://www.nodiatis.com/pub/21.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][i]
And when one day
Dovahkin will be old
all his battles are fought
and all his stories are told.

His torn body weakened
from a long life of war
but its a journey that ends
like it has started before.

Its the circle of power
and Dovahkin hears its call:
A young hero will rise
and the old has to fall.

Once faithful companions
will leave him behind
and once reverent people will
treat him like a different kind.

Whose friendship at last
he will never regret?
Who else will stand beside him
but his own, loyal pet?

"Its only a pet"
now some people might say
but this pet won´t forsake you
until your dying day.
[/i][/center]


This is a traditional pencil drawing, inspired from and made for the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50698/?]Tame the Beasts of Skyrim II[/url]
Check it out, if you´d like to tame any beast and make it your follower :)
